alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 29 at 9:06AM PST until November 30 at 5:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Wind gusts as high as 40 to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 5 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Greater Vancouver Area; Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County
